PHRASE.LANG: This is Vincent's evil twin brother, who spreads fear and destruction where ever he goes. You have won this reward as part of the E3® 2012 promotion. [#Legal]
Voici le frère jumeau maléfique de Vincent, qui sème la peur et la destruction partout où il va. Vous avez gagné cette récompense à l'occasion de la promotion de l'E3® 2012. [#Legal]
Das ist Vincents böser Zwillingsbruder, der überall für Angst, Schrecken und Verwüstung sorgt. Du hast diese Belohnung im Zuge der E3®-2012-Promotion gewonnen. [#Legal]
Questo è il diabolico gemello di Vincent, che semina paura e distruzione ovunque vada. Hai vinto questo premio come parte della promozione per l'E3® 2012. [#Legal]
Es el malvado hermano gemelo de Vicente, y difunde miedo dondequiera que vaya. Has conseguido este premio gracias a la promoción del E3® 2012. [#Legal]
This is Vincent's evil twin brother, who spreads fear and destruction where ever he goes. You have won this reward as part of the E3® 2012 promotion. [#Legal]
이 자는 빈센트의 악한 쌍둥이 형제로서, 가는 곳마다 공포와 파멸을 퍼뜨리고 다닙니다. 이 리워드는 E3® 2012 프로모션의 일환으로 당신에게 주어졌습니다.[#Legal]
This is Vincent's evil twin brother, who spreads fear and destruction where ever he goes. You have won this reward as part of the E3® 2012 promotion. [#Legal]
這是文森特的邪惡孿生兄弟，每到一處都會大肆散佈恐懼和破壞。您已獲得這屬於2012年E3®推廣活動中一部分的獎品道具。[#Legal]
這是文森特的邪惡孿生兄弟，每到一處都會大肆散佈恐懼和破壞。您已獲得這屬於2012年E3®推廣活動中一部分的獎品道具。[#Legal]
This is Vincent's evil twin brother, who spreads fear and destruction where ever he goes. You have won this reward as part of the E3® 2012 promotion. [#Legal]
